column1: Table 6.4 Skills data by typical education needed for entry, 2023
Note: Skills scores range from 1.0 (Not important) to 5.0 (Extremely important). More information can be found on the EP definitions page: https://www.bls.gov/emp/documentation/definitions.htm.
Note: Skills data for education categories are calculated using an employment-weighted average of the skills data for the detailed occupations within each education category.
Source: Employment Projections program, U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics
